definition: (onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: He is very ugly but a lovely mummer.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然很醜但卻是個可愛的啞劇演員。

sentences.english: But a lovely mummer , he murmured to himself .
sentences.chinese: “然而是個可愛的啞劇演員，”他自言自語着。

sentences.english: A pair of stage sisters did a pantomime in costume.
sentences.chinese: 一對舞臺姐妹演了一出化裝的啞劇。

sentences.english: Fixed bug in Wes' mime animations while mounted.
sentences.chinese: 修復韋斯騎牛時啞劇動畫的問題。

sentences.english: The interpretive artists and mimes had some issues about something and took to the streets in front of my apartment.
sentences.chinese: 他們把解釋藝術和啞劇演員都搬到了我寓所前的街上。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to have no sense of shame/brazen
to make a fool of oneself
to get straight to the point (idiom)
